thread.title: A place I call home
thread.title_full: A place I call home - Review of Andaz Wall Street, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: nyc_downtowngirl
title: A place I call home
text: Favourite Hotel in NYC. Didn't get the chance to stay there many times but every time I do it is like coming home. Jorge Gutierrez is a rock star. He always makes me feel like coming home and ensures everything has been taking care of. He always knows all the hotspots in the city! Thanks for all your hard work.
